name: Jack Frost [Demo]
description:
You recently moved back to your hometown to get away from the stressful life in a busy city. Here in Eustis, a small town nestled between miles of forest and mountains, you start to reminisce on the past: old shops that no longer exist, woods that you used to explore, an imaginary friend… 

But what happens if that friend really isn’t so imaginary?

— 

A slow burn fantasy romance in a visual novel! Full game will contain +18 scenes depending on player choices. 

Note: Choices in the demo do not matter, but once Chapter One is released choices will matter.

Features:

  • 7,800+ words
  • 2 CGs
  • Nameable player character
  • 1 ending (more endings upon full release of game)
